strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
strats.note: Use a Super to knock off a Sova and follow it to this door. The fastest Sova is just above the shot blocks, which takes 30 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Use a Super to knock off a Sova and follow it to this door. The fastest Sova is just above the shot blocks, which takes 30 seconds.

strats.name: Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Run off of the entry runway after storing the Shinespark to skip the platform with a Sova.

strats.name: Carry Shinecharge
strats.note: Shoot the door open while entering, then run and jump under the platform above to get to the right side quickly.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged
strats.devNote: There is a possibility of slipping on this runway when entering the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave Sparking (Bottom)
note: After landing, do a small jump and spark mid-air.
Alternatively, if you can avoid tripping while entering the room, another option is to moonwalk back against the left door to get high enough to spark without bonking the platform on the right.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave Sparking
strats.note: Shoot the door open while entering, land near the door, then run and jump under the platform above to get to the right side quickly.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged
strats.devNote: There is a possibility of slipping on this runway when entering the room.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Carry Shinecharge (HiJump)
strats.note: Carefully avoid hitting the Sova.

strats.name: Carry Shinecharge (Sova Kill)
strats.note: Spin-jump up and kill the Sova from the left just before landing on its platform.

strats.name: Carry Shinecharge (Sova Evade, Wall Jump)
strats.note: Wall jump off the side of the platform and weave around the Sova to get onto the ledge above.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump)
strats.note: Carefully avoid hitting the Sova.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump, Bottom)
strats.note: Carefully avoid hitting the Sova.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Sova Kill)
strats.note: Spin-jump up and kill the Sova from the left just before landing on its platform.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Sova Kill, Bottom)
strats.note: Spin-jump up and kill the Sova from the left just before landing on its platform.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Sova Kill)
strats.note: Spin-jump up and kill the Sova from the left just before landing on its platform.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
strats.note: Use a Super to knock off the Sova while it is on the left side of the platform next to this door then quickly freeze it once it crawls into position.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Use a Super to knock off a Sova and follow it to this door. The fastest Sova is just above the shot blocks, which takes 20 seconds.

Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Spark
Carry Shinecharge (HiJump)
strats.note: Jump over the platform with the Sova that would otherwise be in the way.

strats.note: Spin-jump up and kill the Sova from the left just before landing on its platform.

strats.note: Spin-jump up and kill the Sova from the left just before landing on its platform.

strats.name: Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Requires very efficient movement.
strats.devNote: 1 unusable tile.

Climb up 2 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Carry Shinecharge
strats.note: Fall around the floating platform with either a Downback or by jumping down with a Spinjump.

strats.note: Fall around the floating platform with either a Downback or by jumping down with a Spinjump.

strats.note: Fall around the floating platform with either a Downback or by jumping down with a Spinjump.

G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
strats.note: Use a Super to knock off the nearby Sova while it is on the right side of its platform.

Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 3 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Short Runway)
strats.note: Quickly climb the right side of the room to just have enough time to shinespark out the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Spark
note: Quickly climb the left side of the room to just have enough time to shinespark out the door.
Requires precise ledge grabs, but some precise walljumps can make it slightly easier.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump)
Come in Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump)

note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 2 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Bottom)
strats.note: Quickly climb the right side of the room to just have enough time to shinespark out the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Spark
strats.note: Quickly climb the right side of the room to just have enough time to shinespark out the door.
strats.devNote: Sparking out in top position is very tight, hence the canInsaneJump requirement.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Bottom)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Carry Shinecharge (Sova Evade or Kill)
strats.note: If Screw Attack is unavailable, do a low spin jump to make it over the Sova without taking a hit.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Sova Kill)
strats.note: Shoot the top Sova while falling.
strats.devNote: 1 unusable tile, since you need space to gain a little speed before falling.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Sova Evade)
strats.note: Shoot the top Sova while falling to delay its movement.
strats.devNote: Closed end because this strat might not work if sliding off, depending on the run speed.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Sova Damage)
Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Left Side Weave)
note: Slide off the ledge while gaining a shinecharge, and hold forward to clear both platforms, killing the Sova with temporary blue.
Weave down the left side of the room, avoiding landing on any platforms.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Right Side Weave)
Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Use a Super to knock off a Sova and follow it to this door.
The fastest Sova is just above the middle left door, while it is on the left side of the platform, which takes 45 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: Use a Super to knock off a Sova and follow it to this door.
The fastest Sova is just above the middle left door, while it is on the left side of the platform, which takes 45 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: Use a Super to knock off the Sova to regain mobility.

strats.name: Carry Shinecharge (Insane Sova Evade)
note: Jump onto the Sova platform, and off again, without getting hit.
This requires a very clean ledge grab.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (HiJump)
strats.devNote: 1 unusable tile, otherwise it is too slow.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Sova Kill, Short Runway)
strats.note: Kill the Sova.
strats.devNote: 1 unusable tile, to avoid needing to turn around.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Sova Evade)
strats.note: Jump over the Sova.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Insane Sova Evade)
note: Jump onto the Sova platform without getting hit.
This requires a very clean ledge grab.

strats.name: Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Fall around the floating platform with either a Downback or by jumping down with a Spinjump.

strats.name: Leave With Spark
strats.devNote: Sparking out in top position is very tight, hence the canInsaneJump requirement.

nodes.name: Junction Below Right Item
nodes.note: Just below the Energy tank. Reachable to kill the Sova without Morph.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: Note that breaking the left bomb blocks and either the crumble blocks or the other bomb blocks could make the Sova go in a loop without ever getting to the door (unless using a Super).
Because of this it is advised not to break the bomb blocks. But if breaking them is necessary, it is possible to do so, even with a Power Bomb.
Place the Power Bomb while the Sova is in the bottom left section of the room, while it is moving counter-clockwise.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: It takes the Sova about 25 seconds to hit Samus.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs
note: Roll through the camera scroll block in the morph tunnel at the bottom of the room to overload PLMs,
then get to the right side through the crumble blocks or bomb blocks near the left item.
This can be done with an IBJ or two Spring Ball Bomb Jumps.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport
note: After teleporting, hold left and release Grapple to remain in a standing pose (and not be force crouched).
X-ray climb a specific distance, performing exactly 15 X-Ray stand-ups.
Then morph and roll out to the right.
If Bombs, Power Bombs, or Screw Attack are available, this can allow more lenience in how far to climb.

strats.name: HiJump E-Tank Sova Boost
note: Crouch jump and let the Sova move into Samus from the right, to get a upward boost, then hold left to boost horizontally to the ledge.
Then crouch jump from the slope on the left, and morph into a neutral damage boost.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
strats.note: Artificial morph IBJ or use two bomb boost spring ball jumps.
strats.devNote: This is only useful if the item is Morph.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Remote Acquire Left Item
strats.note: Get to the item without overloading PLMs by avoiding entering the morph tunnel at the bottom of the room or using Power Bombs near the items.

strats.name: G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using scroll blocks in the morph tunnel. The camera will not scroll to the left side of the room.

strats.name: G-Mode Overload PLMs with the Left Item
note: Placing a Power Bomb a 0.5 to 1 tile away from the item plinth to bounce Samus onto it (where the right item usually is) while also overloading PLMs as the explosion hits the left item.
Wait for the explosion to completely finish before touching the crumble blocks or they will remain solid.
The camera will not scroll to the left side of the room.
strats.devNote: FIXME: This item will be remote acquired, but it is ignored here since the strat is canRiskPermanentLossOfAccess.

strats.name: G-Mode Overload PLMs with the Right Item
strats.note: Overload PLMs by rolling through the item then go through the crumble blocks. The camera will not scroll to the left side of the room.
strats.devNote: FIXME: This item will be remote acquired, but it is ignored here since will require an obstacle and the strat is canRiskPermanentLossOfAccess.

strats.name: Leave with Runway
devNote: The bomb blocks have to be intact, but it's always possible to get to this node without breaking them.
If the bomb blocks were broken, this runway could be extended with a frozen Sova.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: Release the Sova by breaking the crumble blocks. The Sova will then take 40 seconds to get to the door.
Note that breaking the left bomb blocks and either the crumble blocks or the other bomb blocks could make the Sova go in a loop without ever getting to the door (unless using a Super).
Because of this it is advised not to break the bomb blocks. But if breaking them is necessary, it is possible to do so, even with a Power Bomb.
Place the Power Bomb while the Sova is in the bottom left section of the room, while it is moving counter-clockwise.

strats.name: G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using scroll blocks in the morph tunnel. The camera will not scroll to the left side of the room.
strats.devNote: This is only useful morphless if the item is Morph.

strats.name: Remote Acquire
strats.note: Overload PLMs by rolling through the item, then go through the bomb block and exit G-Mode to obtain the item.
strats.devNote: This does not include canRiskPermanentLossOfAccess as every strat that gets here could instead overload PLMs in the bottom morph tunnel.

strats.name: HiJump E-Tank Return Through Crumble Blocks
strats.note: The crumble blocks do not respawn, so it is possible to enter from the right, obtain the left item and return, without needing to break the bomb blocks.

nodes.name: Top Left Door
nodes.note: Samus is considered to spawn at 6 because of the crumble blocks

nodes.name: Top Left Door Spawn At Junction (Above Crumble Blocks)

strats.name: Carry G-Mode Morph Back Through
strats.devNote: The ability to obtain artificial morph and real morph are both sufficient.

strats.name: Ice Beam Gate Room X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 2 screens.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 2 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Leave with Runway
strats.devNote: FIXME: It is possible to run through the room and leave with runway with a longer runway by antitapping to avoid gaining Blue, and shooting the door open with precise timing.

strats.name: Leave with Runway Floor Blocks Destroyed
Leave With Runway - Slow Frozen Sova
note: If the Power Bomb blocks are broken and the room cannot be reset, the runway can be extended by waiting for the slow global Sova.
Be careful to prevent killing the Sova when breaking the Power Bomb blocks, while still ensuring breaking the ceiling Bomb blocks.
Using a Super to knock off the Sova once it is near the gates will save approximately 30 seconds.
strats.devNote: This strat only takes 60-90 seconds, but could be much longer if Samus has to wait for the Sova to move out of the Power Bomb area.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: Release the ceiling Sova while being careful not to kill it if using Power Bombs.
The Sova takes 90 seconds to get to the door if the Power Bomb blocks are broken and 45 seconds if they are not.
Using a Super when the Sova is exiting the ceiling takes only 12 seconds.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Blocks
strats.note: Place a Power Bomb and exit G-Mode in order to break the blocks.

strats.name: Insane Mockball
strats.devNote: FIXME: This can be done with 8 tiles (technically even 7.4375 tiles) but would require higher movement tech.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: Release the ceiling Sova while being careful not to kill it if using Power Bombs.
Go through the ceiling morph tunnel and wait for the Sova on the other side.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Chain (Come in Shinecharging)
note: Use a temporary blue chain to jump through the bomb blocks and land on the center of the ledge above.
Break the last block by jumping directly into it as there is not enough height available to get a bounce.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Chain With X-Ray (Come in Shinecharging)
note: Use a temporary blue chain to jump through the bomb blocks and land on the center of the ledge above.
Break the last block by jumping directly into it as there is not enough height available to get a bounce.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Chain With X-Ray (In Room)
note: Use a temporary blue chain to jump through the bomb blocks and land on the center of the ledge above.
Break the last block by jumping directly into it as there is not enough height available to get a bounce.

strats.name: Stored Moonfall Clip
strats.note: Moonfall twice to clip through the Bomb and Power Bomb blocks.

strats.name: Sova, Mella, and Sm. Dessgeega Farm
Crystal Flash
strats.note: Kill some or all of the enemies before Crystal Flashing.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Mella or Small Dessgeega
strats.note: Either enemy type can be used, so it may be best to kill one and use the other.

strats.name: Careful Kill
note: Avoiding damage from all enemies with just Power Beam is tricky, but doable.
Enter the room holding angle to remove momentum and avoid getting hit by the Dessgeega.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Blocks (Indirect G-Mode)
note: It is tricky but possible to cross the room without any damage by rolling through the room.
The enemies can be killed with extra Power Bombs, but without them, it's arguably easier to roll through the room without the use a Spring Ball or Bombs.
After crossing the room, use a Power Bomb then quickly exit G-Mode before it explodes in order to break the bomb and Power Bomb blocks above.
Without Spring Ball, it is still possible to place the Power Bomb high enough to break all the blocks above from an IBJ and still exit G-Mode before it explodes.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Blocks (Direct G-Mode)
note: It is tricky but possible to cross the room without any damage by jumping over the Small Dessgeega on room entry then using a Power Bomb to kill several enemies.
Note that crossing the room damageless is easier in indirect G-Mode.
After crossing the room, use a Power Bomb then quickly exit G-Mode before it explodes in order to break the bomb and Power Bomb blocks above.
Without Spring Ball, it is still possible to place the Power Bomb high enough to break all the blocks above from an IBJ and still exit G-Mode before it explodes.

strats.name: Speed Through and Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Store the Shinespark after the second shutter to avoid breaking the Bomb Blocks in the floor.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs
strats.note: Place Bombs against the crumble block to overload PLMs, then go through it and through the bomb blocks at the left.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs, Power Bomb the Blocks
note: Place Bombs against the crumble block to overload PLMs, then go through it and through the bomb blocks at the left.
Place a Power Bomb and quuickly exit G-Mode before it goes off in order to break the blocks.

strats.name: Transition with Stored Fall Speed (more speed)
Stored Moonfall Clip
note: Run under the gates with SpeedBooster but do not break the Bomb Blocks.
Moonfall twice to clip through the Power Bomb blocks.

strats.name: Prepared Entry
strats.note: Use SpringBall to bounce on the crumble blocks, then unmorph and shoot the door open.

strats.name: Ice Beam Gate Room Frozen Sova Platform
note: Place a Power Bomb to break the Power Bomb blocks and the bomb blocks, without killing the global Sova.
Wait 30-50 seconds for the Sova to get into position to be used as a platform.
strats.devNote: This is only notable with wall jumps disabled.

strats.name: Ice Beam Gate Room Sova Boost
note: Place a Power Bomb to break the Power Bomb blocks and the bomb blocks, without killing the global Sova.
Wait 30-50 seconds for the Sova to get into position.
Crouch jump, morph, and hold right against the wall, hitting the Sova from below while near the peak of Samus's jump.
Continue holding right to pass through the Sova and onto the ledge above.
devNote: This is only notable with wall jumps disabled.
FIXME: Consider also adding a Mella version of this strat. It takes longer to setup but allows retrying.
The Mella version does slightly less damage.
With either the Mella or Sova, you could kill it and collect its drop after getting onto the ledge; for the Sova you'd have to wait for it to come back around.

strats.name: Careful Kill
strats.note: Avoiding damage from all enemies with just Power Beam is tricky, but doable.

strats.name: Mockball
strats.note: With a fast mockball, it is possible to roll under all of the enemies.

strats.name: Power Bomb
strats.note: Placing the Power Bomb high enough will also break the bomb blocks in the ceiling.

strats.name: Leave with Runway with Frozen Tripper
Platforming and Leave with Mockball
strats.devNote: Freezing two Trippers would also be possible.

strats.name: Platforming and Leave with Frozen Tripper Runway
Platforming and Leave with Frozen Tripper Runway
Leave with Runway with Frozen Tripper

to.devNote: This is considered one-way even though technically you can get from 2 to 5 without falling to 5 with a tight jump using Spring Ball. This won't be expected for heat run times

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Wait 80 seconds for the Sova to get into position, then freeze it to bridge the gap and significantly extend the runway.
The other Sovas can be farmed or used as a backup.
strats.devNote: Because the Sovas are global, strats could be added that start from the other doors to tighten the total frame count, but it will typically require heatProof either way.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: It takes about 1.5 minutes for the Sova to get to this door and hit Samus.

strats.name: Screw Attack
strats.devNote: The bottom Fune shoots a fireball which wastes all of the time save of a Leave with Runway strat.

strats.name: Frozen Funes Leave with Runway - Kill Fune
Grapple Teleport
note: To minimize heat damage, immediately after landing use Grapple to open the door while running towards it, then jump over the gap and through the door.
If the door is grappled too late, it may interfere with the jump.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Wait 3 minutes for the Sova to get into position, or 100 seconds with Morph by going ahead of them to break the shot blocks as they get there.
This can be further reduced to 45 seconds with a Super by knocking a Sova off after it exits the morph tunnel.
The other Sovas can be farmed or used as a backup.
strats.devNote: Because the Sovas are global, strats could be added that start from the other doors to tighten the total frame count, but it will typically require heatProof either way.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
note: It takes about 2.5 minutes for the Sova to get to this door and hit Samus.
Alternatively, use a Super just after the Sovas go off screen to speed it up to 40 seconds.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport
note: To minimize heat damage, immediately after landing use Grapple to open the door while running towards it, then jump over the gap and through the door.
If the door is grappled too late, it may interfere with the jump.

strats.name: Crystal Flash
strats.note: Kill the Fune before Crystal Flashing.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: It takes about 20 seconds for the Sova to get to this door and hit Samus.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged
strats.note: Reaching the Morph hole can be tricky with SpeedBooster but no HiJump.

strats.name: Tank Damage
strats.devNote: Base IBJ should kill the Sovas or go around.

strats.name: Speedrun Ice Beam Entry
note: Smoothly jump into the morph tunnel while killing the Sovas.
Unmorph at the end of the tunnel to clear more Sovas is needed.

strats.name: Damage Boost
strats.note: Wait for the Sova to leave the tunnel and jump morph into them to bounce up into the hole.

strats.name: Sova Freeze
strats.note: Freeze a Sova once it enters one of the slots on the wall and then use it as a platform.

strats.name: Leave with Runway - Dead Fune
strats.devNote: FIXME: unlocksDoors: powerbomb would not have an ammo cost as one is used as part of the strat.

strats.name: Base
strats.devNote: It is faster to go around than to climb with Ice.

strats.name: Tank Damage
strats.note: The Sovas should be killed if you are heat proof.

strats.name: Gravity
strats.devNote: FIXME: Add a lava dip + spring ball midair strat, and a HiJump + damage boost strat.

strats.name: Speedy Jump
strats.note: Use the full runway in order to get a good jump.

strats.name: Boyon PB Kill
strats.note: Requires laying PBs on the very edge of the platform by the doorway, mostly hanging over the lava, in order to double hit the rightmost Boyon.

strats.name: Boyon Super Kill
note: Jump and shoot supers diagonally down at the rightmost Boyon.
Jump at the edge of the platform and shoot just before hitting the ceiling, or start one tile left and shoot while at the ceiling.

strats.name: Boyon Hit
note: It's possible to get into the passage by a non-mockball mid-air morph.
It just needs to be fairly late. The Boyon will then push Samus into the passage.

strats.name: Lateral Mid-Air Morph
strats.note: A well-executed lateral mid-air morph can get into the passage without taking a hit.

strats.name: Ice
strats.note: An ice shot can shoot through the wall below the Morph tunnel and can freeze the Boyon even without Wave.

strats.name: Ice Beam Tutorial Room Impressive Damage Boost
strats.note: Unmorph with the right timing to damage boost using the Boyon who is closest to the Morph tunnel in order to avoid taking any lava damage.

to.note: If none of the strats can be done, falling down to 2 and going back up to the item may still be doable.
If no strat is applicable, the only option is to fall down to 2 and climb back up to 1.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Top Item Crumble Jump
strats.note: Shoot the shot block, then crumble jump on the middle platform.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Top Item Crumble Spin Jump
strats.note: Shoot the shot block, then crumble spin jump on the middle platform.

strats.name: Precise Walljump
note: Jump and aim down to lower the camera so the middle platform Sova starts moving.
Then shoot the shot block and walljump off the left side of the middle platform to reach the item.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Top Item Frozen Sova
note: Jump and aim down to lower the camera so the middle platform Sova starts moving.
Then freeze it by aiming down, shoot the shot block, and use the Sova as a stable platform.

strats.name: Spring Ball
strats.note: Shoot the shot block, then Spring Ball on the middle platform.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft HiJump Climb
strats.note: Walljump up the right, then setup a walljump on the top-right crumble platform directly from the right wall.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft HiJumpless Climb
strats.note: Walljump up the right, then walljump off the top-middle crumble platform then off the top-right one.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Consecutive Crumble Climb
strats.note: Do 9 successive crumble jumps up the platforms.
strats.devNote: This is only really useful without wall jumps.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Wall/Crumble Climb
strats.note: Walljump up the right then do one crumble jump on the top middle platform.

strats.name: Spring Ball
strats.note: Hold jump to easily do 9 successive spring ball bounces up the platforms.

strats.name: Wall Jump with Space Jump
strats.note: Walljump up the right, then use SpaceJump at the top.

strats.name: Space Jump
strats.note: Use SpaceJump to get to the top.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft IBJ (Right)
note: Kill the Sova on the bottom-right platform, then IBJ right next to the left of the platform.
Samus can align with the left side of the platform by jumping into it.
Changing the IBJ speed may be necessary to get past the second Sova.

strats.name: Heatproof Crumble Shaft IBJ
note: Kill the Sova on the bottom-right platform, then IBJ right next to the left of the platform.
Samus can align with the left side of the platform by jumping into it.
Place bombs to kill the second Sova. Drop to the bottom and restart if necessary.

strats.name: WallJump and SpringBall
strats.note: Walljump up the right then SpringBall bounce on top of the highest Crumble Block platform to reach the door.

strats.name: Shinespark Climb
strats.note: It has to be setup really close to the left side of the right platforms, otherwise it also requires a crumble jump at the top.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Frozen Climb
strats.note: Climb up the left, freeze the top-left Sova, and use it as a platform to reach the door.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 3 screens.
strats.devNote: Heat frames split into the actual climb and the setup in the adjacent room.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 3 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport (from Red Brinstar Firefleas)
note: After the teleport, immediately press down to extend Grapple to avoid bonking on the ceiling overhang;
note that buffering the down input through the transition will not work.
Then swing over to the door.
Crumble jump in case the swing does not make it all the way to the door.
Samus will be visible but off-camera; swinging back and forth to fix the camera is possible, at the cost of additional heat damage.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport (from Moat)
note: After the teleport, immediately press down to extend Grapple to avoid bonking on the ceiling overhang;
note that buffering the down input through the transition will not work.
Then swing over to the door.
Samus will be visible but off-camera; swinging back and forth to fix the camera is possible, at the cost of additional heat damage.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
strats.note: To minimize heat frames, briefly wait for the Sova to be on the top right of the platform before knocking it off to shorten its path to the door.
strats.devNote: There are more alternatives to the single canCrumbleJump, but it is basically assumed at this difficulty.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: Use a Super to knock off the Sova to regain mobility.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft IBJ (Left)
strats.note: IBJ against the left-most wall. Changing the IBJ speed may be necessary to get past the Sova.

strats.name: Heatproof Crumble Shaft IBJ
strats.note: IBJ against the left-most wall. Place bombs to kill the Sova. Drop to the bottom and restart if necessary.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Shinespark Climb
strats.note: It is easiest to do a diagonal shinespark up the left wall, then hold left, angle down, and spam shoot to easily grab the item.

strats.name: Crumble Shaft Top Door Crumble Jump
Frozen Sova
note: Expects to freeze and use two Sovas back-to-back, as leniency to account for position variations.
Also has an extra buffer for possibly needing to wait beforehand for the left Sova to position itself right.

strats.name: Space Jump
strats.note: Must have grabbed the item with a spinjump still active.

strats.name: Precise Walljump
note: Walljump off the sides of the crumble block platforms to reach the door.

120.name: Crocomire Speedway

nodes.name: Top of the Shaft Left Door

devNote: FIXME: It is possible to stored fall speed clip through the door at 3 by using a fast run speed turnaround to slide down the stairs.

strats.name: Leave Shinecharged
strats.devNote: FIXME: Entering with too little run speed causes Samus to 'trip', so the runway cannot reliably be used for short shortcharges.

strats.name: Leave with Runway
strats.devNote: 45 tiles is roughly in front of the first red pirate.

strats.name: Croc Speedway Speed Block Moondance (Leave with Stored Fall Speed)
note: Use SpeedBooster to construct a structure for Moondancing that has 1 chest height block and 1 head height block to the right of it and no other Speed blocks.
Crystal Flash below the lower block, exactly pixel aligned with its right side, to standup and then begin Moondancing.
After Samus sinks through the bottom tile, it is possible to use Grapple to return to a crouch and wiggle right and then Turn-Around Aim Cancel to escape to the right.
Without Grapple, count to 174 Moonfalls and delicately Moonfall so as to remain crouched and then wiggle to the right.
Finally, use SpeedBooster if needed to break the remaining Speed blocks and reach the door.
strats.devNote: FIXME: R-Mode can be used instead of a Crystal Flash but that depends on having more Reserve Energy than Regular Energy.

strats.name: Croc Speedway Speed Block Moondance (Leave with More Stored Fall Speed)
note: Use SpeedBooster to construct a structure for Moondancing that has 1 chest height block and 1 head height block to the right of it and no other Speed blocks.
Crystal Flash below the lower block, exactly pixel aligned with its right side, to standup and then begin Moondancing.
After Samus sinks through the floor tiles, use Grapple to return to a standing position and count an additional 145 moonfalls.
Then use Grapple to return to a crouch and wiggle right and Turn-Around Aim Cancel to escape to the right.
Finally, use SpeedBooster if needed to break the remaining Speed blocks and reach the door.
strats.devNote: FIXME: R-Mode can be used instead of a Crystal Flash but that depends on having more Reserve Energy than Regular Energy.

strats.name: Croc Speedway Reverse Spark (From Croc Door)
note: Spark left through the speed blocks through Croc Speedway.
Then run to the right and back to get speed to go through the rest.
The shinespark expects to kill the crumble bridge pirate, to be safe.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.devNote: This strat is not useful in-room, but can satisfy a strat in the room before with an exit shinespark.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.devNote: This strat is not useful in-room, but can satisfy a strat in the room before with an exit shinespark.

strats.name: Croc Speedway Reverse Speedball
strats.note: Break the Speedway Speed blocks by jumping over the gap with speed and continuing through the room in mockball.
strats.devNote: FIXME: You can enter through 3 and speedball through the speedway.

strats.name: Croc Speedway Reverse Spark Near SpeedBlocks
note: Spark left through the speed blocks through Croc Speedway.
Then run to the right and back to get speed to go through the rest.
The shinespark expects to kill the crumble bridge pirate, to be safe.

strats.name: Croc Speedway Reverse Spark Through Door
note: Spark left through the speed blocks through Croc Speedway.
Then run to the right and back to get speed to go through the rest.
The shinespark expects to kill the crumble bridge pirate, to be safe.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb (Two Screens)
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.

strats.name: Croc Speedway Reverse Spark (From Save Room)
note: The timer is tight, so run through the Cacatacs and mid-air spark left through the speed blocks.
Then run to the right and back to get speed to go through the rest.
The shinespark expects to kill the crumble bridge pirate, to be safe.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb (Two Screens)
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.

strats.name: Base
strats.devNote: The blocks will already be broken, the blue speed is to kill the enemies.

strats.name: Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Enabled by coming in from the left and breaking the speed blocks on the way, or coming in charged and opening the path to the left.

strats.name: Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Enabled by coming in from the left and breaking the speed blocks on the way, or coming in charged and opening the path to the left.

strats.name: Quick Platforming Leave Shinecharged
note: Move very quickly to bring a shinespark from the speedway up to the Save Room door.
Preclear the Cacatacs, and it may help to not run while platforming if HiJump is not available.

devNote: FIXME: A moonfall using Multiviolas might be possible to bypass the door shell below.

strats.name: Crocomire Escape High Speed Gate Glitch
note: Build up 34 tiles worth of run speed and jump into the door on the last frame.
Hold angle up through the transition but also aim down to duck below the ceiling until Samus is past it.
Fire the Super Missile frame perfectly to open the gate.
devNote: 1 extra tile is added so that you can jump into the door, simplifying the inputs a bit.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.
Samus will not be visible during the climb.

strats.name: Croc Escape Frozen Geruta Shinecharge (Shinespark Out Right)
note: Enter from the right door and spin jump onto the first ledge while barely landing on the ledge in order to prevent getting the Geruta on camera.
Walk against the left wall and jump to trigger the Geruta. It should now be moving leftwards.
Stand on the next platform against the right wall and shoot the Geruta to get it one shot away from being frozen.
After a few swoops, it will come down; either freeze it or tank a hit. Then go up and stand on the corner and freeze it when it is in position.
The Geruta will be stuck below and keep swooping, so if Energy permits, Samus will have several attempts.
Quickly shinecharge left to right, kill the Geruta and spark out the bottom right door.

strats.name: Croc Escape Lava IBJ
strats.note: Kill the Dragon with bombs, then start the IBJ in the lava. It's an option without canJumpIntoIBJ.

strats.name: Croc Escape SpringBall Bomb Boost
note: Uses a bomb boost at the end of a mid-air SpringBall jump.
Also requires a crouchjump and downgrab to complete the maneuver.

strats.name: Croc Escape SpringBall Freeze
strats.note: Do a series of mid-air SpringBall jumps to bring the Geruta over, then freeze it and step on it.

strats.name: Croc Escape HiJump Freeze
strats.note: Lure the Geruta left by jumping towards it from below. Freeze it and use it as a platform.

strats.name: Croc Escape Ice Only Geruta Platforming
note: Ride the Geruta left to reach the missile location by freezing it repeatedly.
Stay on its left side when it touches the ceiling for the enemy to continue moving forward.
It may not be possible to climb back up to the Geruta if Samus falls.
When it moves towards the ceiling, reset Samus' fall speed using an unmorph or by taking knockback damage, in order to wait for the Geruta to fall low enough to refreeze.

strats.name: Enter with Shinespark Stored
strats.note: Watch out for the Geruda. Running left before jumping to bring it on camera will make it swoop left.

strats.name: Enter Shinecharging
strats.note: Watch out for the Geruda. Running left before jumping to bring it on camera will make it swoop left.

strats.name: Croc Escape Frozen Geruta Shinecharge (Shinespark Left)
note: Enter from the right door and spin jump onto the first ledge while barely landing on the ledge in order to prevent getting the Geruta on camera.
Walk against the left wall and jump to trigger the Geruta. It should now be moving leftwards.
Stand on the next platform against the right wall and shoot the Geruta to get it one shot away from being frozen.
After a few swoops, it will come down; either freeze it or tank a hit. Then go up and stand on the corner and freeze it when it is in position.
The Geruta will be stuck below and keep swooping, so if Energy permits, Samus will have several attempts.
With full heat protection, Samus can quickly shinecharge left to right then run and spark midair to the left to save Energy.

strats.name: Speedjump
strats.note: This can be done from the top right, single tile block.

strats.name: HiJump
strats.note: This can be done from the top right, single tile block.

strats.name: Safe Lava Bath
strats.note: This strat just waits out the Dragon.
